CSSStyleDeclarationGetPropertyCSSValue.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The CSSStyleDeclaration.getPropertyCSSValue()
method interface returns a containing the CSS value for a
property. Note that it returns null if the property name is a
shorthand property.

blockquote.para:
Note: This interface was part of an attempt to create a typed CSS Object Model. This attempt has been abandoned, and most browsers do
not implement it.
To achieve your purpose, you can use:

CSSStyleDeclarationGetPropertyCSSValue.returns: A containing the CSS value for a property. If none exists, returns null.
